content: Hello Jeyachandran! Good morning. Congratulations on making it to the technical round of the interview. As your interviewer, I'll be asking you some questions to evaluate your skills and experience. Let's get started! Based on your resume, I noticed that you have worked on several projects as an intern at various companies. Can you tell me about your experience working on the Virtual AI Interview project? What was your role, and what were some of your key responsibilities?
